ProductQuantityRule.name: ProductQuantityRule
ProductQuantityRule.description: Represents the relationship between a quantity rule and a product. This object assigns quantity rules to a product.

CurrencyIsoCode.description: The ISO code for the currency that’s specified on the buyer’s account. This field is exposed in orgs that have multicurrency enabled. Default value is USD.

Name.description: Name of the product quantity rule.

PurchaseQuantityRuleId.description: ID of the related purchase quantity rule.

ProductQuantityRule.accessRules: The ProductQuantityRule object is available only if the B2B Commerce license or Automotive Cloud license is enabled.
